name: Boost Before Forgetting
description: Tests BOOST command to increase concept usage so it survives forgetting passes. Each query creates its own isolated facts to test boost/forget independently.

theory.natural_language: Base theory with minimal facts. Each query will create and test its own concepts for boost/forget scenarios.

queries.natural_language: Create and boost ImportantNote, then forget - should survive.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. ImportantNote was asserted, boosted to 5, above threshold 3.
expected_answer.explanation: BOOST raises usageCount; FORGET threshold=3 removes only low-usage concepts.

queries.natural_language: Create ScratchNote without boosting, then forget - should be removed.

expected_answer.natural_language: No. ScratchNote had low usage (1) and was forgotten.

queries.natural_language: Create and boost CriticalItem with high value, use high threshold.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. CriticalItem was boosted to 20, above threshold 10.
expected_answer.explanation: High boost value ensures survival against high threshold.

queries.natural_language: Create TempItem, don't boost, use high threshold - should be removed.

expected_answer.natural_language: No. TempItem was not boosted and is below threshold.
expected_answer.explanation: Unboosted TempItem removed by threshold=10 forget.

queries.natural_language: Create HighPriority, boost to exactly threshold, should survive.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Boost of 4 + initial usage of 1 = 5, equals threshold 5.

queries.natural_language: Create LowPriority, boost above threshold, should survive.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. LowPriority boosted to 8+1=9, above threshold 5.

queries.natural_language: Create Essential, boost to 5, threshold 5, should survive.

expected_answer.natural_language: Yes. Essential boosted to 5+1=6, above threshold 5.

queries.natural_language: Create Disposable, no boost, threshold 5, should be removed.

expected_answer.natural_language: No. Disposable had no boost (usage=1), below threshold 5.
